column4: hey, is there any good torrent client under linux (something like ?torrent)?
ther's several good ones, utorrent works great via wine, transmission, ktorrent, etc

thans mate, i actually tried utorrent under wine but its not way to go for me (emulation) and after few houres it starts to use lots of memory. i tried ktorrent aswell but its just not as good as ?torrent and its kde based (im gnome user) havent seen transmission tho, will take a look
i like transmission,t here's also azeurus, and deluge ithink
